name: The Night Of The Living Bread
name_original: The Night Of The Living Bread
description:
Save your entire kind by stopping the deadly mold plague.  Eliminate all infected loafs before they spread to your brothers and sisters. Will you be able to defeat them all? Or will you have to sacrifice something for the greater good?

Shop upgrades consist of - Full HP refill, Fire Rate upgrade and next bread evolution

Controls:

wasd - movement

left mouse button - shoot / click buttons
